name: PAW
description:
PAW is a game where you can play with your friends, 2-4 players. In this game you have to throw out of the map the other players to win. You can use some power ups on your car to help you on your duty and become the best driver!

You can also play with your friends using Parsec: https://parsecgaming.com/

This program will allow you to play with your friends as if they were in your house! It's really simple, just download it for FREE with your friends and get their PC connected to the host. Then just  play PAW!!

Studio: Pantry Panic

Brais Alvarez: Programmer 

Adrian Fuster: Producer and Game Designer

Felix Fernandez: Game Designer and Artist

This game is only available to play with Controller.
